segments.text: What an absurd situation in this kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The faucet is left on, water spilling everywhere uncontrollably.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's just standing there, drying a plate like nothing's wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her apron and dress will be soaked soon enough.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Puddle growing larger by the second on the tile floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now the kids, sneaking cookies from the high cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Boy balanced precariously on that flimsy stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's going to collapse, and cookies will fly everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl aiding and abetting, hand outstretched greedily.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Why can't they just ask nicely?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window shows a nice garden, but inside it's a sloppy mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't stand watching this carelessness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is going to end in tears.
segments.speaker: PAR
